english.segment1: All of the ground is sinking sand. A doubting maze of desert land. Where darkness rules the heart of man. Til the sun shines light on him
english.segment2: Lord of all, Show youre strong. All my needs they fall
english.segment3: Chorus: Be a cornerstone. Be a cornerstone. Be a rock, higher than I. Be my fortress wall. Be a foundation for all, My cornerstone
english.segment4: The buildings swaying in the wind. The towers crumble down again. This certainly will be the end. Of them not built on him
english.segment5: Lord of all. Show your strong. All my needs they fall
english.segment7: You. You are the builder of my heart. You. Held me together from the start
